cells.literal: As Han fifth year used prime minister initially followed, merit comparable to Tangyi Marquis, one thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: In the fifth year of Han, he was used as prime minister and initially followed, with merit comparable to the Tangyi Marquis, receiving one thousand households.

cells.content: 正月壬子封，十年薨。
cells.literal: First month Ren Zi day enfeoffed, tenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Ren Zi day of the first month; died in the tenth year.

cells.content: 八十七
cells.literal: Eighty-seven
cells.idiomatic: Eighty-seven

cells.content: 孝惠四年，頃侯臣嗣，十八年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaohui fourth year, Qing Marquis Chen succeeded, eighteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Hui's fourth year, Qing Marquis Chen succeeded to the marquisate; died in the eighteenth year.

cells.content: 孝文七年，懷侯義嗣，二年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen seventh year, Huai Marquis Yi succeeded, second year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's seventh year, Huai Marquis Yi succeeded to the marquisate; died in the second year.

cells.content: 九年，惠侯它嗣，十九年薨。
cells.literal: Ninth year, Hui Marquis Tuo succeeded, nineteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the ninth year, Hui Marquis Tuo succeeded to the marquisate; died in the nineteenth year.

cells.content: 孝景五年，共侯善嗣，五年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaojing fifth year, Gong Marquis Shan succeeded, fifth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Jing's fifth year, Gong Marquis Shan succeeded to the marquisate; died in the fifth year.

cells.content: 六世中三年，侯談嗣，三十五年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Sixth generation middle third year, Marquis Tan succeeded, thirty-fifth year, Yuanding fifth year, convicted of tribute wine deficiency, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth generation, during the middle third year, Marquis Tan succeeded to the marquisate; in the thirty-fifth year, during the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of tribute wine deficiency and dismissed.

cells.content: 元康四年二月，青玄孫長陵大夫陽詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year second month, Lü Qing's great-great-grandson Changling Dafu Yang commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the second month of the fourth year of Yuankang, Lü Qing's great-great-grandson, Changling Dafu Yang, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 東武貞侯郭蒙
cells.literal: Dongwu Zhen Marquis Guo Meng
cells.idiomatic: Dongwu Zhen Marquis Guo Meng

cells.content: 以戶衛起薛，屬周呂侯，破秦軍杠里，陷楊熊軍曲遇，入漢，為城將，定三秦，以都尉堅守敖倉，為將軍破項籍，侯，三千戶。
cells.literal: As household guard rose from Xue, belonged to Zhou Lü Hou, broke Qin army at Gangli, trapped Yang Xiong army at Quyu, entered Han, became city general, pacified the Three Qins, as commander firmly defended Aocang, as general broke Xiang Yu, made marquis, three thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As a household guard, he rose up from Xue and belonged to Zhou Lü Hou. He broke the Qin army at Gangli and trapped Yang Xiong's army at Quyu. He entered Han service, became a city general, and pacified the Three Qin territories. As a commander, he firmly defended Aocang; as a general, he broke Xiang Yu and was made a marquis with three thousand households.

cells.content: 正月戊午封，十九年薨。
cells.literal: First month Wu Wu day enfeoffed, nineteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Wu Wu day of the first month; died in the nineteenth year.

cells.content: 四十一
cells.literal: Forty-one
cells.idiomatic: Forty-one

cells.content: 高后六年，侯它嗣，三十一年，孝景六年，有罪，棄市。戶萬一百。
cells.literal: Gao Hou sixth year, Marquis Tuo succeeded, thirty-first year, Xiaojing sixth year, guilty, executed in market. Households eleven thousand.
cells.idiomatic: In Empress Gao's sixth year, Marquis Tuo succeeded to the marquisate; in the thirty-first year, during the sixth year of Xiaojing, he was found guilty and executed in the marketplace. His fief had eleven thousand households.

cells.content: 孫
cells.literal: Grandson
cells.idiomatic: Grandson

cells.content: 曾孫
cells.literal: Great-grandson
cells.idiomatic: Great-grandson

cells.content: 元康四年，蒙玄孫茂陵公士廣漢詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Guo Meng's great-great-grandson Maoling Gongshi Guanghan commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Guo Meng's great-great-grandson, Maoling Gongshi Guanghan, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 汁防肅侯壅齒
cells.literal: Zhifang Su Marquis Yong Chi
cells.idiomatic: Zhifang Su Marquis Yong Chi

cells.content: 以趙將前三年從定諸侯，二千五百戶，功比平定侯。齒故沛豪，有力，與上有隙，故晚從。
cells.literal: As Zhao general previous third year followed in pacifying the lords, two thousand five hundred households, merit comparable to Pingding Marquis. Chi was formerly Pei strongman, had force, had enmity with the emperor, therefore followed late.
cells.idiomatic: As a Zhao general in the previous third year, he followed in pacifying the other lords and received two thousand five hundred households, with merit comparable to the Pingding Marquis. Chi was formerly a Pei strongman with great strength. He had enmity with the emperor and therefore followed late.

cells.content: 三月戊子封，九年薨。
cells.literal: Third month Wu Zi day enfeoffed, ninth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Wu Zi day of the third month; died in the ninth year.

cells.content: 五十七
cells.literal: Fifty-seven
cells.idiomatic: Fifty-seven

cells.content: 孝惠三年，荒侯鉅鹿嗣，三十八年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaohui third year, Huang Marquis Julu succeeded, thirty-eighth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Hui's third year, Huang Marquis Julu succeeded to the marquisate; died in the thirty-eighth year.

cells.content: 孝景三年，侯野嗣，十年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaojing third year, Marquis Ye succeeded, tenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Jing's third year, Marquis Ye succeeded to the marquisate; died in the tenth year.

cells.content: 終侯桓嗣，不得年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Zhong Marquis Huan succeeded, did not reach full age, Yuanding fifth year, convicted of tribute wine deficiency, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Zhong Marquis Huan succeeded to the marquisate but did not reach full age. In the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of tribute wine deficiency and dismissed.

cells.content: 棘蒲剛侯陳武
cells.literal: Jipu Gang Marquis Chen Wu
cells.idiomatic: Jipu Gang Marquis Chen Wu

cells.content: 以將軍前元年將卒二千五百人起薛，別救東阿，至霸上，二歲十月入漢，擊齊歷下軍臨菑侯。
cells.literal: As general previous first year leading two thousand five hundred soldiers rose from Xue, separately rescued Dong'e, to Baxiang, second year tenth month entered Han, attacked Qi Lixia army Linzi Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a general in the previous first year, he led two thousand five hundred soldiers who rose up from Xue. He separately rescued Dong'e and reached Baxiang. In the second year, tenth month, he entered Han service and attacked the Qi army at Lixia under the Linzi Marquis.

cells.content: 三月丙申封，三十八年，孝文後元年薨。子奇反，誅，不代。
cells.literal: Third month Bing Shen day enfeoffed, thirty-eighth year, Xiaowen Hou first year died. Son Qi rebelled, executed, not succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Bing Shen day of the third month; died in the thirty-eighth year, during the first year of the Xiaowen Hou period. His son Qi rebelled, was executed, and did not succeed to the marquisate.

cells.content: 十三
cells.literal: Thirteen
cells.idiomatic: Thirteen

cells.content: 子
cells.literal: Son
cells.idiomatic: Son

cells.content: 孫
cells.literal: Grandson
cells.idiomatic: Grandson

cells.content: 元康四年，武曾孫雲陽上造嘉詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Chen Wu's great-grandson Yunyang Shangzao Jia commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Chen Wu's great-grandson, Yunyang Shangzao Jia, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 都昌嚴侯朱軫
cells.literal: Duchang Yan Marquis Zhu Zhen
cells.idiomatic: Duchang Yan Marquis Zhu Zhen

cells.content: 以舍人前元年從起沛，以隊帥先降翟王，虜章邯，侯。
cells.literal: As retainer previous first year followed uprising from Pei, as team commander first surrendered Di King, captured Zhang Han, made marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a retainer in the previous first year, he followed the uprising from Pei. As a team commander, he was the first to surrender the Di King and captured Zhang Han, for which he was made a marquis.

cells.content: 三月庚子封，十四年薨。
cells.literal: Third month Geng Zi day enfeoffed, fourteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Geng Zi day of the third month; died in the fourteenth year.

cells.content: 二十三
cells.literal: Twenty-three
cells.idiomatic: Twenty-three

cells.content: 高后元年，剛侯率嗣，十五年薨。
cells.literal: Gao Hou first year, Gang Marquis Shuai succeeded, fifteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Empress Gao's first year, Gang Marquis Shuai succeeded to the marquisate; died in the fifteenth year.

cells.content: 孝文八年，夷侯詘嗣，十六年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen eighth year, Yi Marquis Qu succeeded, sixteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's eighth year, Yi Marquis Qu succeeded to the marquisate; died in the sixteenth year.

cells.content: 孝景元年，共侯偃嗣，二年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaojing first year, Gong Marquis Yan succeeded, second year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Jing's first year, Gong Marquis Yan succeeded to the marquisate; died in the second year.

cells.content: 三年，侯辟彊嗣，五年，中元年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Third year, Marquis Pi Qiang succeeded, fifth year, Zhong first year died, no successor.
cells.idiomatic: In the third year, Marquis Pi Qiang succeeded to the marquisate; in the fifth year, during the first year of Zhong, he died with no successor.

cells.content: 元康四年，軫玄孫昌侯國公士先詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Zhu Zhen's great-great-grandson Changhouguo Gongshi Xian commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Zhu Zhen's great-great-grandson, Changhouguo Gongshi Xian, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 武疆嚴侯嚴不職
cells.literal: Wujiang Yan Marquis Yan Buzhi
cells.idiomatic: Wujiang Yan Marquis Yan Buzhi

cells.content: 以舍人從起沛，至霸上，以騎將入漢，還擊項籍，屬丞相甯，功侯。用將軍擊黥布，侯。
cells.literal: As retainer followed uprising from Pei, to Baxiang, as cavalry general entered Han, returned to attack Xiang Yu, belonged to Chancellor Ning, merited marquis. As general attacked Qing Bu, made marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a retainer, he followed the uprising from Pei and reached Baxiang. As a cavalry general, he entered Han service, then returned to attack Xiang Yu under Chancellor Ning, meriting a marquisate. As a general, he attacked Qing Bu and was made a marquis.

cells.content: 三月庚子封，二十年薨。
cells.literal: Third month Geng Zi day enfeoffed, twentieth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Geng Zi day of the third month; died in the twentieth year.

cells.content: 三十三
cells.literal: Thirty-three
cells.idiomatic: Thirty-three

cells.content: 高后七年，簡侯嬰嗣，十九年薨。
cells.literal: Gao Hou seventh year, Jian Marquis Ying succeeded, nineteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Empress Gao's seventh year, Jian Marquis Ying succeeded to the marquisate; died in the nineteenth year.

cells.content: 孝文後二年，侯青翟嗣，四十七年，元鼎二年年，坐為丞相建御史大夫湯不直，自殺。
cells.literal: Xiaowen Hou second year, Marquis Qing Di succeeded, forty-seventh year, Yuanding second year, convicted of as Chancellor Jian and Yushi Dafu Tang not being upright, committed suicide.
cells.idiomatic: In the second year of the Xiaowen Hou period, Marquis Qing Di succeeded to the marquisate; in the forty-seventh year, during the second year of Yuanding, he was convicted of failing to be upright as Chancellor Jian and Yushi Dafu Tang, and committed suicide.

cells.content: 元康四年，不職曾孫長安公乘仁詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Yan Buzhi's great-grandson Chang'an Gongcheng Ren commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Yan Buzhi's great-grandson, Chang'an Gongcheng Ren, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 貰齊合侯傅胡害
cells.literal: Shiqi He Marquis Fu Huhai
cells.idiomatic: Shiqi He Marquis Fu Huhai

cells.content: 以越戶將從破秦，入漢，定三秦，以都尉擊項籍，侯，六百戶，功比臺侯。
cells.literal: As Yue household commander followed in breaking Qin, entered Han, pacified Three Qin, as commander attacked Xiang Yu, made marquis, six hundred households, merit comparable to Tai Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a Yue household commander, he followed in breaking the Qin dynasty, entered Han service, and pacified the Three Qin territories. As a commander, he attacked Xiang Yu and was made a marquis with six hundred households, with merit comparable to the Tai Marquis.

cells.content: 三月庚子封，二年薨。
cells.literal: Third month Geng Zi day enfeoffed, second year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Geng Zi day of the third month; died in the second year.

cells.content: 三十六
cells.literal: Thirty-six
cells.idiomatic: Thirty-six

cells.content: 八年，共侯方山嗣，二十年薨。
cells.literal: Eighth year, Gong Marquis Fangshan succeeded, twentieth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the eighth year, Gong Marquis Fangshan succeeded to the marquisate; died in the twentieth year.

cells.content: 孝文元年，煬侯赤嗣，十一年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen first year, Yang Marquis Chi succeeded, eleventh year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's first year, Yang Marquis Chi succeeded to the marquisate; died in the eleventh year.

cells.content: 十二年，康侯遺嗣，四十四年薨。
cells.literal: Twelfth year, Kang Marquis Yi succeeded, forty-fourth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the twelfth year, Kang Marquis Yi succeeded to the marquisate; died in the forty-fourth year.

cells.content: 元朔五年，侯猜嗣，八年，元鼎元年，坐殺人，棄市。
cells.literal: Yuanshuo fifth year, Marquis Chai succeeded, eighth year, Yuanding first year, convicted of murder, executed in market.
cells.idiomatic: In the fifth year of Yuanshuo, Marquis Chai succeeded to the marquisate; in the eighth year, during the first year of Yuanding, he was convicted of murder and executed in the marketplace.

cells.content: 元康四年，胡害玄孫茂陵公士世詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Fu Huhai's great-great-grandson Maoling Gongshi Shi commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Fu Huhai's great-great-grandson, Maoling Gongshi Shi, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 元壽二年八月，詔賜胡害為後者爵大上造。
cells.literal: Yuanshou second year eighth month, commanded to grant Fu Huhai's successor the rank of Da Shangzao.
cells.idiomatic: In the eighth month of the second year of Yuanshou, Fu Huhai's successor was commanded to be granted the rank of Da Shangzao.

cells.content: 海陽齊信侯搖母餘
cells.literal: Haiyang Qi Xin Marquis Yao Muyu
cells.idiomatic: Haiyang Qi Xin Marquis Yao Muyu

cells.content: 以越隊將從破秦，入漢，定三秦，以都尉擊項籍，侯，千七百戶。
cells.literal: As Yue team commander followed in breaking Qin, entered Han, pacified Three Qin, as commander attacked Xiang Yu, made marquis, one thousand seven hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Yue team commander, he followed in breaking the Qin dynasty, entered Han service, and pacified the Three Qin territories. As a commander, he attacked Xiang Yu and was made a marquis with one thousand seven hundred households.

cells.content: 三月庚子封，九月薨。
cells.literal: Third month Geng Zi day enfeoffed, ninth month died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Geng Zi day of the third month; died in the ninth month.

cells.content: 三十七
cells.literal: Thirty-seven
cells.idiomatic: Thirty-seven

cells.content: 孝惠三年，哀侯昭襄嗣，九年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaohui third year, Ai Marquis Zhaoxiang succeeded, ninth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Hui's third year, Ai Marquis Zhaoxiang succeeded to the marquisate; died in the ninth year.

cells.content: 高后五年，康侯建嗣，三十年薨。
cells.literal: Gao Hou fifth year, Kang Marquis Jian succeeded, thirtieth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Empress Gao's fifth year, Kang Marquis Jian succeeded to the marquisate; died in the thirtieth year.

cells.content: 孝景四年，哀侯省嗣，十年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Xiaojing fourth year, Ai Marquis Sheng succeeded, tenth year died, no successor.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Jing's fourth year, Ai Marquis Sheng succeeded to the marquisate; died in the tenth year with no successor.

cells.content: 玄孫
cells.literal: Great-great-grandson
cells.idiomatic: Great-great-grandson

cells.content: 六世元康四年，母餘玄孫之子不更未央詔復家。
cells.literal: Sixth generation Yuankang fourth year, Yao Muyu's great-great-grandson's son Bugeng Weiyang commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth generation, fourth year of Yuankang, Yao Muyu's great-great-grandson's son, Bugeng Weiyang, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 元壽二年八月，詔賜母餘代後者賢爵關內侯。
cells.literal: Yuanshou second year eighth month, commanded to grant Yao Muyu's successor Xian the rank of Guannei Hou.
cells.idiomatic: In the eighth month of the second year of Yuanshou, Yao Muyu's successor Xian was commanded to be granted the rank of Guannei Hou.

cells.content: 南安嚴侯宣虎
cells.literal: Nanan Yan Marquis Xuan Hu
cells.idiomatic: Nanan Yan Marquis Xuan Hu

cells.content: 以河南將軍漢王三年降晉陽，以重將破臧荼，侯，九百戶。
cells.literal: As Henan general Han King third year surrendered Jinyang, as heavy general broke Zang Tu, made marquis, nine hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As Henan general, he surrendered Jinyang to the Han King in the third year. As a heavy general, he broke Zang Tu and was made a marquis with nine hundred households.

cells.content: 三月庚子封，三十年薨。
cells.literal: Third month Geng Zi day enfeoffed, thirtieth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Geng Zi day of the third month; died in the thirtieth year.

cells.content: 六十三
cells.literal: Sixty-three
cells.idiomatic: Sixty-three

cells.content: 孝文九年，共侯戎嗣，十一年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen ninth year, Gong Marquis Rong succeeded, eleventh year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's ninth year, Gong Marquis Rong succeeded to the marquisate; died in the eleventh year.

cells.content: 後四年，侯千秋嗣，十一年，孝景中元年，坐傷人，免。戶二千一百。
cells.literal: Hou fourth year, Marquis Qianqiu succeeded, eleventh year, Xiaojing middle first year, convicted of injuring person, dismissed. Households two thousand one hundred.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Hou, Marquis Qianqiu succeeded to the marquisate; in the eleventh year, during the first year of Xiaojing's middle period, he was convicted of injuring someone and dismissed. His fief had two thousand one hundred households.

cells.content: 元康四年，虎曾孫南安簪褭護詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Hu's great-grandson Nan'an Zanliao Hu commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Hu's great-grandson, Nan'an Zanliao Hu, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 肥如敬侯蔡寅
cells.literal: Feiru Jing Marquis Cai Yin
cells.idiomatic: Feiru Jing Marquis Cai Yin

cells.content: 以魏太僕漢王三年初從，以車騎將軍破龍且及彭城，侯，千戶。
cells.literal: As Wei chariot master Han King third year initially followed, as chariot cavalry general broke Long Qu and Pengcheng, made marquis, one thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As Wei chariot master, he initially followed the Han King in the third year. As chariot cavalry general, he broke Long Qu and Pengcheng, and was made a marquis with one thousand households.

cells.content: 三月庚子封，二十四年薨。
cells.literal: Third month Geng Zi day enfeoffed, twenty-fourth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Geng Zi day of the third month; died in the twenty-fourth year.

cells.content: 六十六
cells.literal: Sixty-six
cells.idiomatic: Sixty-six

cells.content: 孝文三年，嚴侯戎嗣，十四年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen third year, Yan Marquis Rong succeeded, fourteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's third year, Yan Marquis Rong succeeded to the marquisate; died in the fourteenth year.

cells.content: 後元年，侯奴嗣，七年，孝景元年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Hou first year, Marquis Nu succeeded, seventh year, Xiaojing first year died, no successor.
cells.idiomatic: In the first year of Hou, Marquis Nu succeeded to the marquisate; died in the seventh year, during the first year of Xiaojing, with no successor.

cells.content: 元康四年，寅曾孫肥如大夫福詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Yin's great-grandson Feiru Dafu Fu commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Yin's great-grandson, Feiru Dafu Fu, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 曲成圉侯蟲達
cells.literal: Qucheng Yu Hou Chong Da
cells.idiomatic: Qucheng Yu Hou Chong Da

cells.content: 以西城戶將三十七人從起碭，至霸上，為執金吾，五年，為二隊將，屬周呂侯，入漢，定三秦，以都尉破項籍陳下，侯，四千戶。以將軍擊燕、代。
cells.literal: As Xicheng household commander thirty-seven men followed uprising from Dang, to Baxiang, became Zhijinwu, fifth year, became second team commander, belonged to Zhou Lü Hou, entered Han, pacified Three Qin, as commander broke Xiang Yu at Chenxia, made marquis, four thousand households. As general attacked Yan, Dai.
cells.idiomatic: As Xicheng household commander with thirty-seven men, he followed the uprising from Dang to Baxiang. He became Zhijinwu, and in the fifth year became second team commander under Zhou Lü Hou. He entered Han service, pacified the Three Qin territories, and as a commander broke Xiang Yu at Chenxia, for which he was made a marquis with four thousand households. As a general, he attacked Yan and Dai.

cells.content: 三月庚子封，二十二年薨。
cells.literal: Third month Geng Zi day enfeoffed, twenty-second year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Geng Zi day of the third month; died in the twenty-second year.

cells.content: 十八位次曰夜侯恆。
cells.literal: Eighteenth position called Ye Hou Heng.
cells.idiomatic: Eighteenth in rank: Ye Hou Heng.

cells.content: 孝文元年，侯捷嗣，八年，有罪，免。十四年，捷復封，十八年，復免。戶九千三百。孝景中五年，侯捷復封，五年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen first year, Marquis Jie succeeded, eighth year, guilty, dismissed. Fourteenth year, Jie re-enfeoffed, eighteenth year, again dismissed. Households nine thousand three hundred. Xiaojing middle fifth year, Marquis Jie re-enfeoffed, fifth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's first year, Marquis Jie succeeded to the marquisate; in the eighth year, he was guilty and dismissed. In the fourteenth year, Jie was re-enfeoffed; in the eighteenth year, he was dismissed again. His fief had nine thousand three hundred households. In the fifth year of Xiaojing's middle period, Marquis Jie was re-enfeoffed and died in the fifth year.

cells.content: 建元二年，侯皇柔嗣，二十四年，元鼎二年，坐為汝南太守知民不用赤側錢為賦，為鬼薪。
cells.literal: Jianyuan second year, Marquis Huang Rou succeeded, twenty-fourth year, Yuanding second year, convicted of as Runan taishou knowing people not using red side money for taxes, made gui xian.
cells.idiomatic: In the second year of Jianyuan, Marquis Huang Rou succeeded to the marquisate; in the twenty-fourth year, during the second year of Yuanding, he was convicted of knowing as Runan taishou that the people were not using red side money for taxes, and was made to perform gui xian labor.

cells.content: 曾孫
cells.literal: Great-grandson
cells.idiomatic: Great-grandson

cells.content: 元康四年，達玄孫茂陵公乘宣詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Da's great-great-grandson Maoling Gongcheng Xuan commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Da's great-great-grandson, Maoling Gongcheng Xuan, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 河陽嚴侯陳涓
cells.literal: Heyang Yan Hou Chen Juan
cells.idiomatic: Heyang Yan Hou Chen Juan

cells.content: 以卒前元年起碭從，以二隊將入漢，擊項籍，得梁郎將處，侯。以丞相定齊。
cells.literal: As soldier previous first year rose from Dang followed, as second team commander entered Han, attacked Xiang Yu, got Liang langjiang Chu, made marquis. As chancellor pacified Qi.
cells.idiomatic: As a soldier, he rose up from Dang in the previous first year and followed. As second team commander, he entered Han service, attacked Xiang Yu, captured Liang langjiang Chu, and was made a marquis. As chancellor, he pacified Qi.

cells.content: 三月庚子封，二十二年薨。
cells.literal: Third month Geng Zi day enfeoffed, twenty-second year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Geng Zi day of the third month; died in the twenty-second year.

cells.content: 二十九
cells.literal: Twenty-nine
cells.idiomatic: Twenty-nine

cells.content: 孝文元年，信嗣，三年，坐不償人責過六月，免。
cells.literal: Xiaowen first year, Xin succeeded, third year, convicted of not repaying people's debts over six months, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's first year, Xin succeeded to the marquisate; in the third year, he was convicted of not repaying people's debts for over six months and dismissed.

cells.content: 孫
cells.literal: Grandson
cells.idiomatic: Grandson

cells.content: 曾孫
cells.literal: Great-grandson
cells.idiomatic: Great-grandson

cells.content: 元康四年，涓玄孫即丘公士元詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Juan's great-great-grandson Jicheng Gongshi Yuan commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Juan's great-great-grandson, Jicheng Gongshi Yuan, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 淮陰侯韓信
cells.literal: Huaiyin Hou Han Xin
cells.idiomatic: Huaiyin Hou Han Xin

cells.content: 初以卒從項梁，梁死，屬項羽為郎中，至咸陽，亡從入漢，為連敖票客。蕭何言信為大將軍，別定魏、趙，為齊王，徙楚，擅發兵，廢為侯。
cells.literal: Initially as soldier followed Xiang Liang, Liang died, belonged to Xiang Yu as langzhong, to Xianyang, fled to enter Han, became Lian'ao binke. Xiao He recommended Xin as grand general, separately pacified Wei, Zhao, became Qi King, moved to Chu, arbitrarily mobilized troops, deposed to marquis.
cells.idiomatic: Initially as a soldier, he followed Xiang Liang. After Liang's death, he served Xiang Yu as a langzhong. He reached Xianyang, then fled to join Han forces, becoming a binke under Lian'ao. Xiao He recommended Han Xin as grand general. He separately pacified Wei and Zhao, became King of Qi, was moved to Chu, arbitrarily mobilized troops, and was deposed to marquis.

cells.content: 六年封，五年，十一年，坐謀反誅。
cells.literal: Sixth year enfeoffed, fifth year, eleventh year, convicted of plotting rebellion executed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the sixth year; died in the fifth year, executed in the eleventh year for plotting rebellion.

cells.content: 芒侯耏跖
cells.literal: Mang Hou Guo Zhi
cells.idiomatic: Mang Hou Guo Zhi

cells.content: 以門尉前元年初起碭，至霸上，為定武君，入漢，還定三秦，為都尉擊項羽，功侯。
cells.literal: As gate captain previous first year initially rose from Dang, to Baxiang, became Dingwu Jun, entered Han, returned to pacify Three Qin, as commander attacked Xiang Yu, merited marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As gate captain, he initially rose up from Dang in the previous first year and reached Baxiang. He became Dingwu Jun, entered Han service, returned to pacify the Three Qin territories, and as a commander attacked Xiang Yu, meriting a marquisate.

cells.content: 六年封，三年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Sixth year enfeoffed, third year died, no successor.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the sixth year; died in the third year with no successor.

cells.content: 張九年，侯昭嗣，四年，有罪，免，孝景三年，詔以故列侯將兵擊吳楚，復封。
cells.literal: Zhang ninth year, Marquis Zhao succeeded, fourth year, guilty, dismissed, Xiaojing third year, commanded as former liehou to lead troops attack Wu Chu, re-enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: In Zhang's ninth year, Marquis Zhao succeeded to the marquisate; in the fourth year, he was guilty and dismissed. In Xiaojing's third year, he was commanded as a former liehou to lead troops against Wu and Chu, and was re-enfeoffed.

cells.content: 侯申嗣，元朔六年，坐尚南宮公主不敬，免。
cells.literal: Marquis Shen succeeded, Yuanshuo sixth year, convicted of disrespect to Nan Gong princess, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Shen succeeded to the marquisate; in the sixth year of Yuanshuo, he was convicted of disrespect to Princess Nangong and dismissed.

cells.content: 敬市侯閻澤赤
cells.literal: Jing Shi Hou Yan Ze Chi
cells.idiomatic: Jing Shi Hou Yan Ze Chi

cells.content: 以執盾初起從入漢，為河上守，遷為殷相，擊項籍，侯，千戶，功比平定侯。
cells.literal: As shield bearer initially rose followed entered Han, became Heshang guard, promoted to Yin chancellor, attacked Xiang Yu, made marquis, one thousand households, merit comparable to Pingding Hou.
cells.idiomatic: As a shield bearer, he initially rose up and followed into Han service. He became Heshang guard, was promoted to Yin chancellor, attacked Xiang Yu, and was made a marquis with one thousand households, with merit comparable to the Pingding Hou.

cells.content: 四月癸未封，三年薨。
cells.literal: Fourth month Gui Wei day enfeoffed, third year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Gui Wei day of the fourth month; died in the third year.

cells.content: 五十五
cells.literal: Fifty-five
cells.idiomatic: Fifty-five

cells.content: 九年，夷侯無害嗣，三十八年薨。
cells.literal: Ninth year, Yi Marquis Wu Hai succeeded, thirty-eighth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the ninth year, Yi Marquis Wu Hai succeeded to the marquisate; died in the thirty-eighth year.

cells.content: 孝文後四年，戴侯續嗣，八年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen Hou fourth year, Dai Marquis Xu succeeded, eighth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of the Xiaowen Hou period, Dai Marquis Xu succeeded to the marquisate; died in the eighth year.

cells.content: 孝景五年，侯穀嗣，四十年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Xiaojing fifth year, Marquis Gu succeeded, fortieth year, Yuanding fifth year, convicted of tribute wine deficiency, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Jing's fifth year, Marquis Gu succeeded to the marquisate; in the fortieth year, during the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of tribute wine deficiency and dismissed.

cells.content: 六世元康四年，澤赤玄孫之子長安上造章世詔復家。
cells.literal: Sixth generation Yuankang fourth year, Ze Chi's great-great-grandson's son Chang'an Shangzao Zhang Shi commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth generation, fourth year of Yuankang, Ze Chi's great-great-grandson's son, Chang'an Shangzao Zhang Shi, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 柳丘齊侯戎賜
cells.literal: Liuqiu Qi Hou Rong Ci
cells.idiomatic: Liuqiu Qi Hou Rong Ci

cells.content: 以連敖從起薛，以三隊將入漢，定三秦，以都尉破項籍軍，為將軍，侯，八千戶。
cells.literal: As Lian'ao followed uprising from Xue, as third team commander entered Han, pacified Three Qin, as commander broke Xiang Yu army, became general, made marquis, eight thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As Lian'ao, he followed the uprising from Xue. As third team commander, he entered Han service, pacified the Three Qin territories, broke Xiang Yu's army as a commander, became a general, and was made a marquis with eight thousand households.

cells.content: 六月丁亥封，十八年薨。
cells.literal: Sixth month Ding Hai day enfeoffed, eighteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Ding Hai day of the sixth month; died in the eighteenth year.

cells.content: 三十九
cells.literal: Thirty-nine
cells.idiomatic: Thirty-nine

cells.content: 高后五年，侯安國嗣，三十年薨。
cells.literal: Gao Hou fifth year, Marquis An Guo succeeded, thirtieth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Empress Gao's fifth year, Marquis An Guo succeeded to the marquisate; died in the thirtieth year.

cells.content: 孝景四年，敬侯嘉成嗣，十年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaojing fourth year, Jing Marquis Jia Cheng succeeded, tenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Jing's fourth year, Jing Marquis Jia Cheng succeeded to the marquisate; died in the tenth year.

cells.content: 後元年，侯角嗣，有罪，免。戶三千。
cells.literal: Hou first year, Marquis Jiao succeeded, guilty, dismissed. Households three thousand.
cells.idiomatic: In the first year of Hou, Marquis Jiao succeeded to the marquisate; guilty and dismissed. His fief had three thousand households.

cells.content: 元康四年，賜玄孫長安公士元生詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Ci's great-great-grandson Chang'an Gongshi Yuansheng commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Ci's great-great-grandson, Chang'an Gongshi Yuansheng, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 魏其嚴侯周止
cells.literal: Weiqi Yan Hou Zhou Zhi
cells.idiomatic: Weiqi Yan Hou Zhou Zhi

cells.content: 以舍人從起沛，以郎中入漢，為周信侯，定三秦，以為騎郎將，破項籍東城，侯，千戶。
cells.literal: As retainer followed uprising from Pei, as langzhong entered Han, became Zhou Xin Hou, pacified Three Qin, as cavalry langjiang broke Xiang Yu Dongcheng, made marquis, one thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As a retainer, he followed the uprising from Pei. As langzhong, he entered Han service, became Zhou Xin Hou, pacified the Three Qin territories, broke Xiang Yu at Dongcheng as cavalry langjiang, and was made a marquis with one thousand households.

cells.content: 六月丁亥封，十八年薨。
cells.literal: Sixth month Ding Hai day enfeoffed, eighteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Ding Hai day of the sixth month; died in the eighteenth year.

cells.content: 四十四
cells.literal: Forty-four
cells.idiomatic: Forty-four

cells.content: 高后五年，侯簡嗣，二十九年，孝景三年，謀反，誅。戶三千。
cells.literal: Gao Hou fifth year, Marquis Jian succeeded, twenty-ninth year, Xiaojing third year, plotted rebellion, executed. Households three thousand.
cells.idiomatic: In Empress Gao's fifth year, Marquis Jian succeeded to the marquisate; in the twenty-ninth year, during Emperor Jing's third year, he plotted rebellion and was executed. His fief had three thousand households.

cells.content: 孫
cells.literal: Grandson
cells.idiomatic: Grandson

cells.content: 曾孫
cells.literal: Great-grandson
cells.idiomatic: Great-grandson

cells.content: 元康四年，止玄孫長陵不更廣世詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Zhi's great-great-grandson Changling Bugeng Guang Shi commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Zhi's great-great-grandson, Changling Bugeng Guang Shi, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 祁穀侯繒賀
cells.literal: Qigu Hou Zeng He
cells.idiomatic: Qigu Hou Zeng He

cells.content: 以執盾漢王三年初起從晉陽，以連敖擊項籍。漢王敗走，賀擊楚迫騎，以故不得進。漢王顧謂賀祈王。戰彭城，斬項籍，爭惡，絕延璧，侯，千四戶。
cells.literal: As shield bearer Han King third year initially rose followed Jinyang, as Lian'ao attacked Xiang Yu. Han King defeated fled, He attacked Chu pursuing cavalry, therefore could not advance. Han King looked back called He Qi Wang. Battled Pengcheng, beheaded Xiang Yu, contended bitterly, cut off extended jade, made marquis, one thousand four hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As a shield bearer, he initially rose up in the Han King's third year and followed from Jinyang. As Lian'ao, he attacked Xiang Yu. When the Han King was defeated and fled, He attacked the Chu pursuing cavalry, which is why he could not advance. The Han King looked back and called He 'Qi Wang.' In the battle of Pengcheng, he beheaded Xiang Yu. The fighting was bitter, and he cut off the extended jade. He was made a marquis with one thousand four hundred households.

cells.content: 六月丁亥封，三十三年薨。
cells.literal: Sixth month Ding Hai day enfeoffed, thirty-third year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Ding Hai day of the sixth month; died in the thirty-third year.

cells.content: 五十一
cells.literal: Fifty-one
cells.idiomatic: Fifty-one

cells.content: 孝文十二年，頃侯胡嗣，十七年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen twelfth year, Qing Marquis Hu succeeded, seventeenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's twelfth year, Qing Marquis Hu succeeded to the marquisate; died in the seventeenth year.

cells.content: 孝景六年，侯它嗣，十九年，元光二年，坐射擅罷，免。
cells.literal: Xiaojing sixth year, Marquis Tuo succeeded, nineteenth year, Yuanguang second year, convicted of shooting arbitrarily dismissed, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Jing's sixth year, Marquis Tuo succeeded to the marquisate; in the nineteenth year, during the second year of Yuanguang, he was convicted of shooting arbitrarily and dismissed.

cells.content: 曾孫
cells.literal: Great-grandson
cells.idiomatic: Great-grandson

cells.content: 元康四年，賀玄孫茂陵公大夫賜詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, He's great-great-grandson Maoling Gong Dafu Ci commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, He's great-great-grandson, Maoling Gong Dafu Ci, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 平悼侯工師喜
cells.literal: Ping Dao Hou Gong Shi Xi
cells.idiomatic: Ping Dao Hou Gong Shi Xi

cells.content: 初以舍人從擊破秦，以郎中入漢，以將軍定諸侯，守雒陽，侯，比費侯賀，千三百戶。
cells.literal: Initially as retainer followed attacked broke Qin, as langzhong entered Han, as general pacified lords, guarded Luoyang, made marquis, comparable to Fei Marquis He, one thousand three hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: Initially as a retainer, he followed in attacking and breaking the Qin dynasty. As langzhong, he entered Han service. As a general, he pacified the other lords and guarded Luoyang. He was made a marquis with merit comparable to Fei Marquis He, receiving one thousand three hundred households.

cells.content: 六月丁亥封，六年薨。
cells.literal: Sixth month Ding Hai day enfeoffed, sixth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Ding Hai day of the sixth month; died in the sixth year.

cells.content: 三十二位次曰聊城侯。
cells.literal: Thirty-second position called Liaocheng Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: Thirty-second in rank: Liaocheng Marquis.

cells.content: 十二年，靖侯奴嗣，三十一年薨。
cells.literal: Twelfth year, Jing Marquis Nu succeeded, thirty-first year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the twelfth year, Jing Marquis Nu succeeded to the marquisate; died in the thirty-first year.

cells.content: 孝文十六年，侯執嗣，十九年，孝景中五年，坐匿死罪，會赦，免。戶三千三百。
cells.literal: Xiaowen sixteenth year, Marquis Zhi succeeded, nineteenth year, Xiaojing middle fifth year, convicted of concealing capital crime, met with amnesty, dismissed. Households three thousand three hundred.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's sixteenth year, Marquis Zhi succeeded to the marquisate; in the nineteenth year, during the fifth year of Xiaojing's middle period, he was convicted of concealing a capital crime but met with an amnesty and was dismissed. His fief had three thousand three hundred households.

cells.content: 魯侯奚涓
cells.literal: Lu Hou Xi Juan
cells.idiomatic: Lu Hou Xi Juan

cells.content: 以舍人從起沛，至咸陽為郎，入漢，以將軍定諸侯，四千八百戶，功比舞陽侯，死軍事。
cells.literal: As retainer followed uprising from Pei, to Xianyang became lang, entered Han, as general pacified lords, four thousand eight hundred households, merit comparable to Wuyang Hou, died in military affairs.
cells.idiomatic: As a retainer, he followed the uprising from Pei. He reached Xianyang and became a lang. He entered Han service, and as a general pacified the other lords, receiving four thousand eight hundred households with merit comparable to Wuyang Hou. He died in military affairs.

cells.content: 重平六年，侯涓亡子，封母底為侯，十九年薨。
cells.literal: Chongping sixth year, Marquis Juan had no son, enfeoffed mother Di as marquis, nineteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth year of Chongping, Marquis Juan had no son, so his mother Di was enfeoffed as marquis; she died in the nineteenth year.

cells.content: 七
cells.literal: Seven
cells.idiomatic: Seven

cells.content: 城父嚴侯尹恢
cells.literal: Chengfu Yan Hou Yin Hui
cells.idiomatic: Chengfu Yan Hou Yin Hui

cells.content: 初以謁者從入漢，以將軍擊定諸侯，以右丞相備守淮陽，功比厭次侯，二千戶。
cells.literal: Initially as ye zhe followed entered Han, as general attacked pacified lords, as right chancellor prepared guarded Huaiyang, merit comparable to Yanci Hou, two thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: Initially as a ye zhe, he followed into Han service. As a general, he attacked and pacified the other lords. As right chancellor, he prepared to guard Huaiyang, with merit comparable to Yanci Hou, receiving two thousand households.

cells.content: 六年封，九年薨。
cells.literal: Sixth year enfeoffed, ninth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the sixth year; died in the ninth year.

cells.content: 二十六
cells.literal: Twenty-six
cells.idiomatic: Twenty-six

cells.content: 孝惠三年，侯開方嗣，七年，高后三年，奪爵為關內侯。
cells.literal: Xiaohui third year, Marquis Kai Fang succeeded, seventh year, Gao Hou third year, title stripped to Guannei Hou.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Hui's third year, Marquis Kai Fang succeeded to the marquisate; in the seventh year, during Empress Gao's third year, his title was stripped and he became a Guannei Hou.

cells.content: 孫
cells.literal: Grandson
cells.idiomatic: Grandson

cells.content: 曾孫
cells.literal: Great-grandson
cells.idiomatic: Great-grandson

cells.content: 玄孫
cells.literal: Great-great-grandson
cells.idiomatic: Great-great-grandson

cells.content: 六世元康四年，恢玄孫之子新豐簪褭殷詔復家。
cells.literal: Sixth generation Yuankang fourth year, Hui's great-great-grandson's son Xinfeng Zanliao Yin commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth generation, fourth year of Yuankang, Hui's great-great-grandson's son, Xinfeng Zanliao Yin, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 任侯張越
cells.literal: Ren Hou Zhang Yue
cells.idiomatic: Ren Hou Zhang Yue

cells.content: 以騎都尉漢五年從起東垣，擊燕、代，屬雍齒，有功，為車騎將軍。
cells.literal: As cavalry commander Han fifth year followed uprising from Dongyuan, attacked Yan, Dai, belonged to Yong Chi, had merit, became chariot cavalry general.
cells.idiomatic: As cavalry commander, he followed the uprising from Dongyuan in the Han King's fifth year. He attacked Yan and Dai, served under Yong Chi, had merit, and became chariot cavalry general.

cells.content: 六年封，十六年，高后三年，坐匿死罪，免。戶七百五十。
cells.literal: Sixth year enfeoffed, sixteenth year, Gao Hou third year, convicted of concealing capital crime, dismissed. Households seven hundred fifty.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the sixth year; in the sixteenth year, during Empress Gao's third year, he was convicted of concealing a capital crime and dismissed. His fief had seven hundred fifty households.

cells.content: 棘丘侯襄
cells.literal: Jiqiu Hou Xiang
cells.idiomatic: Jiqiu Hou Xiang

cells.content: 以執盾隊史前元年從起碭，破秦，治粟內史入漢，以上郡守擊定西魏地，功侯。
cells.literal: As shield bearer team commander previous first year followed uprising from Dang, broke Qin, grain administrator entered Han, as Shangjun governor attacked pacified Western Wei territory, merited marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As shield bearer team commander, he followed the uprising from Dang in the previous first year. He broke the Qin dynasty, served as grain administrator and entered Han service. As Shangjun governor, he attacked and pacified Western Wei territory, meriting a marquisate.

cells.content: 六年封，十四年，高后元年，有罪，免。戶九百七十。
cells.literal: Sixth year enfeoffed, fourteenth year, Gao Hou first year, guilty, dismissed. Households nine hundred seventy.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the sixth year; in the fourteenth year, during Empress Gao's first year, he was guilty and dismissed. His fief had nine hundred seventy households.

cells.content: 河陵頃侯郭亭
cells.literal: Heling Qing Hou Guo Ting
cells.idiomatic: Heling Qing Hou Guo Ting

cells.content: 以連敖前元年從起單父，以塞路入漢，還定三秦，屬周呂侯，以都尉擊項籍，功侯。
cells.literal: As Lian'ao previous first year followed uprising from Shanfu, as blocked path entered Han, returned pacified Three Qin, belonged to Zhou Lü Hou, as commander attacked Xiang Yu, merited marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As Lian'ao, he followed the uprising from Shanfu in the previous first year. As one who blocked the path, he entered Han service, returned to pacify the Three Qin territories, served under Zhou Lü Hou, and as a commander attacked Xiang Yu, meriting a marquisate.

cells.content: 七月庚寅封，二十四年薨。
cells.literal: Seventh month Geng Yin day enfeoffed, twenty-fourth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Geng Yin day of the seventh month; died in the twenty-fourth year.

cells.content: 二十七
cells.literal: Twenty-seven
cells.idiomatic: Twenty-seven

cells.content: 孝文三年，惠侯歐嗣，二十二年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen third year, Hui Marquis Ou succeeded, twenty-second year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's third year, Hui Marquis Ou succeeded to the marquisate; died in the twenty-second year.

cells.content: 孝景二年，勝侯客嗣，八年，有罪，免。
cells.literal: Xiaojing second year, Sheng Marquis Ke succeeded, eighth year, guilty, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Jing's second year, Sheng Marquis Ke succeeded to the marquisate; in the eighth year, he was guilty and dismissed.

cells.content: 南中六年，靖侯延居紹封，十五年薨。
cells.literal: Nanzhong sixth year, Jing Marquis Yan Ju continued enfeoffment, fifteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth year of Nanzhong, Jing Marquis Yan Ju continued the enfeoffment; died in the fifteenth year.

cells.content: 元光六年，侯則嗣，十七年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Yuanguang sixth year, Marquis Ze succeeded, seventeenth year, Yuanding fifth year, convicted of tribute wine deficiency, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth year of Yuanguang, Marquis Ze succeeded to the marquisate; in the seventeenth year, during the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of tribute wine deficiency and dismissed.

cells.content: 元康四年，亭玄孫茂陵公乘賢詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Ting's great-great-grandson Maoling Gongcheng Xian commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Ting's great-great-grandson, Maoling Gongcheng Xian, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 昌武靖信侯單究
cells.literal: Changwu Jing Xin Hou Shan Jiu
cells.idiomatic: Changwu Jing Xin Hou Shan Jiu

cells.content: 初以舍人從，以郎入漢，定三秦，以郎騎將軍擊諸侯，侯，九百戶，功比魏其侯。
cells.literal: Initially as retainer followed, as lang entered Han, pacified Three Qin, as lang cavalry general attacked lords, made marquis, nine hundred households, merit comparable to Weiqi Hou.
cells.idiomatic: Initially as a retainer, he followed. As a lang, he entered Han service and pacified the Three Qin territories. As lang cavalry general, he attacked the other lords and was made a marquis with nine hundred households, with merit comparable to the Weiqi Hou.

cells.content: 七月庚寅封，十三年薨。
cells.literal: Seventh month Geng Yin day enfeoffed, thirteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Geng Yin day of the seventh month; died in the thirteenth year.

cells.content: 四十五
cells.literal: Forty-five
cells.idiomatic: Forty-five

cells.content: 孝惠六年，惠侯如意嗣，四十三年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaohui sixth year, Hui Marquis Ruyi succeeded, forty-third year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Hui's sixth year, Hui Marquis Ruyi succeeded to the marquisate; died in the forty-third year.

cells.content: 孝景中元四年，侯賈成嗣，十六年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaojing Zhongyuan fourth year, Marquis Jia Cheng succeeded, sixteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Xiaojing's Zhongyuan period, Marquis Jia Cheng succeeded to the marquisate; died in the sixteenth year.

cells.content: 元光五年，侯德嗣，四年，元朔三年，坐傷人二旬內死，棄市。戶六百。
cells.literal: Yuanguang fifth year, Marquis De succeeded, fourth year, Yuanshuo third year, convicted of injuring person who died within twenty days, executed in market. Households six hundred.
cells.idiomatic: In the fifth year of Yuanguang, Marquis De succeeded to the marquisate; in the fourth year, during the third year of Yuanshuo, he was convicted of injuring someone who died within twenty days and executed in the marketplace. His fief had six hundred households.

cells.content: 六世
cells.literal: Sixth generation
cells.idiomatic: Sixth generation

cells.content: 七世元康四年，究玄孫之孫陽陵公乘萬年詔復家。
cells.literal: Seventh generation Yuankang fourth year, Jiu's great-great-grandson's grandson Yangling Gongcheng Wannian commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the seventh generation, fourth year of Yuankang, Jiu's great-great-grandson's grandson, Yangling Gongcheng Wannian, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 高宛制侯丙猜
cells.literal: Gaowan Zhi Hou Bing Cai
cells.idiomatic: Gaowan Zhi Hou Bing Cai

cells.content: 初以客從入漢，定三秦，以中尉破項籍，侯，千六百五戶，比斥丘侯。
cells.literal: Initially as guest followed entered Han, pacified Three Qin, as zhong wei broke Xiang Yu, made marquis, one thousand six hundred five households, comparable to Chiqiu Hou.
cells.idiomatic: Initially as a guest, he followed into Han service and pacified the Three Qin territories. As zhong wei, he broke Xiang Yu and was made a marquis with one thousand six hundred five households, comparable to the Chiqiu Hou.

cells.content: 七月戊戌封，七年薨。
cells.literal: Seventh month Wu Xu day enfeoffed, seventh year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Wu Xu day of the seventh month; died in the seventh year.

cells.content: 四十一
cells.literal: Forty-one
cells.idiomatic: Forty-one

cells.content: 孝惠元年，簡侯得嗣，三十年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaohui first year, Jian Marquis De succeeded, thirtieth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Hui's first year, Jian Marquis De succeeded to the marquisate; died in the thirtieth year.

cells.content: 孝文十六年，平侯武嗣，二十四年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen sixteenth year, Ping Marquis Wu succeeded, twenty-fourth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's sixteenth year, Ping Marquis Wu succeeded to the marquisate; died in the twenty-fourth year.

cells.content: 建元元年，侯信嗣，三年，坐出入屬車間，免。戶三千二百。
cells.literal: Jianyuan first year, Marquis Xin succeeded, third year, convicted of entering and leaving between imperial carriages, dismissed. Households three thousand two hundred.
cells.idiomatic: In the first year of Jianyuan, Marquis Xin succeeded to the marquisate; in the third year, he was convicted of entering and leaving between imperial carriages and dismissed. His fief had three thousand two hundred households.

cells.content: 六世
cells.literal: Sixth generation
cells.idiomatic: Sixth generation

cells.content: 七世元康四年，猜玄孫之孫高宛大夫齮詔復家。
cells.literal: Seventh generation Yuankang fourth year, Cai's great-great-grandson's grandson Gaowan Dafu Yi commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the seventh generation, fourth year of Yuankang, Cai's great-great-grandson's grandson, Gaowan Dafu Yi, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 八世元始三年，猜玄孫之曾孫內詔賜爵關內侯。
cells.literal: Eighth generation Yuanshi third year, Cai's great-great-grandson's great-grandson Nei commanded to grant rank Guannei Hou.
cells.idiomatic: In the eighth generation, third year of Yuanshi, Cai's great-great-grandson's great-grandson Nei was commanded to be granted the rank of Guannei Hou.

cells.content: 宣曲齊侯丁義
cells.literal: Xuanqu Qi Hou Ding Yi
cells.idiomatic: Xuanqu Qi Hou Ding Yi

cells.content: 以卒從起留，以騎將入漢，定三秦，破籍軍滎陽，為郎騎將，破鍾離眛軍固陵，侯，六百七十戶。
cells.literal: As soldier followed uprising from Liu, as cavalry general entered Han, pacified Three Qin, broke Yu army at Xingyang, as lang cavalry general broke Zhongli Mei army at Guling, made marquis, six hundred seventy households.
cells.idiomatic: As a soldier, he followed the uprising from Liu. As cavalry general, he entered Han service and pacified the Three Qin territories. He broke Yu's army at Xingyang, and as lang cavalry general broke Zhongli Mei's army at Guling, for which he was made a marquis with six hundred seventy households.

cells.content: 七月戊戌封，三十二年薨。
cells.literal: Seventh month Wu Xu day enfeoffed, thirty-second year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Wu Xu day of the seventh month; died in the thirty-second year.

cells.content: 四十三
cells.literal: Forty-three
cells.idiomatic: Forty-three

cells.content: 發婁孝文十一年，侯通嗣，十七年，有罪，赦為鬼薪。戶千一百。孝景中五年，通復封，十一年，有罪，免。
cells.literal: Falou Xiaowen eleventh year, Marquis Tong succeeded, seventeenth year, guilty, pardoned to gui xin. Households one thousand one hundred. Xiaojing middle fifth year, Tong re-enfeoffed, eleventh year, guilty, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In Falou, Xiaowen's eleventh year, Marquis Tong succeeded to the marquisate; in the seventeenth year, he was guilty but pardoned to perform gui xin labor. His fief had one thousand one hundred households. In Xiaojing's middle fifth year, Tong was re-enfeoffed; in the eleventh year, he was guilty again and dismissed.

cells.content: 孫
cells.literal: Grandson
cells.idiomatic: Grandson

cells.content: 元康四年，義曾孫陽安公士年詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Yi's great-grandson Yang'an Gongshi Nian commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Yi's great-grandson, Yang'an Gongshi Nian, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 終陵齊侯華毋害
cells.literal: Zhongling Qi Hou Hua Wu Hai
cells.idiomatic: Zhongling Qi Hou Hua Wu Hai

cells.content: 以越將從起留，入漢，定三秦，擊臧荼，侯，七百四十戶。從攻馬邑及布。
cells.literal: As Yue general followed uprising from Liu, entered Han, pacified Three Qin, attacked Zang Tu, made marquis, seven hundred forty households. Followed attack on Maiyi and Bu.
cells.idiomatic: As Yue general, he followed the uprising from Liu, entered Han service, pacified the Three Qin territories, and attacked Zang Tu, for which he was made a marquis with seven hundred forty households. He followed in the attack on Maiyi and Bu.

cells.content: 七月戊戌封，三十五年薨。
cells.literal: Seventh month Wu Xu day enfeoffed, thirty-fifth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Wu Xu day of the seventh month; died in the thirty-fifth year.

cells.content: 四十六
cells.literal: Forty-six
cells.idiomatic: Forty-six

cells.content: 孝文四年，共侯勃嗣，十六年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen fourth year, Gong Marquis Bo succeeded, sixteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's fourth year, Gong Marquis Bo succeeded to the marquisate; died in the sixteenth year.

cells.content: 後四年，侯祿嗣，七年，孝景四年，坐出界，耐為司寇。戶千五百。
cells.literal: Hou fourth year, Marquis Lu succeeded, seventh year, Xiaojing fourth year, convicted of crossing boundary, reduced to Sikou. Households one thousand five hundred.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Hou, Marquis Lu succeeded to the marquisate; in the seventh year, during Emperor Jing's fourth year, he was convicted of crossing boundaries and reduced to the rank of Sikou. His fief had one thousand five hundred households.

cells.content: 元康四年，曾孫於陵大夫告詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, great-grandson Yuling Dafu Gao commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, the great-grandson, Yuling Dafu Gao, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 東茅敬侯劉到
cells.literal: Dongmao Jing Hou Liu Dao
cells.idiomatic: Dongmao Jing Hou Liu Dao

cells.content: 以舍人從起碭，至霸上，以二隊入漢，定三秦，以都尉擊項籍，破臧荼，侯，捕韓王信，為將軍。益邑千戶。
cells.literal: As retainer followed uprising from Dang, to Baxiang, as second team entered Han, pacified Three Qin, as commander attacked Xiang Yu, broke Zang Tu, made marquis, captured Han King Xin, became general. Increased fief by one thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As a retainer, he followed the uprising from Dang to Baxiang. As second team commander, he entered Han service and pacified the Three Qin territories. As commander, he attacked Xiang Yu and broke Zang Tu, for which he was made a marquis. He captured Han King Xin and became a general. His fief was increased by one thousand households.

cells.content: 八年丙辰封，二十四年薨。
cells.literal: Eighth year Bing Chen day enfeoffed, twenty-fourth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Bing Chen day of the eighth year; died in the twenty-fourth year.

cells.content: 四十八
cells.literal: Forty-eight
cells.idiomatic: Forty-eight

cells.content: 孝文三年，侯告嗣，十二年，十六年，坐事國人過員，免。
cells.literal: Xiaowen third year, Marquis Gao succeeded, twelfth year, sixteenth year, convicted of employing nationals exceeding quota, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's third year, Marquis Gao succeeded to the marquisate; in the twelfth year, and again in the sixteenth year, he was convicted of employing nationals exceeding the quota and dismissed.

cells.content: 孫
cells.literal: Grandson
cells.idiomatic: Grandson

cells.content: 元康四年，到曾孫鮦陽公乘咸詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Dao's great-grandson Tiaoyang Gongcheng Xian commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Dao's great-grandson, Tiaoyang Gongcheng Xian, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 斥丘懿侯唐厲
cells.literal: Chiqiu Yi Hou Tang Li
cells.idiomatic: Chiqiu Yi Hou Tang Li

cells.content: 以舍人初從起豐，以左司馬入漢，以亞將攻籍，卻敵，為東部都尉，破籍，侯成武，為漢中尉，擊布，為斥丘侯，千戶。
cells.literal: As retainer initially followed uprising from Feng, as left Sima entered Han, as deputy general attacked Yu, repelled enemy, became eastern commandery commander, broke Yu, made Hou at Chengwu, became Han zhong wei, attacked Bu, became Chiqiu Hou, one thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As a retainer, he initially followed the uprising from Feng. As left Sima, he entered Han service. As deputy general, he attacked Yu and repelled the enemy. He became eastern commandery commander, broke Yu, and was made Hou at Chengwu. He became Han zhong wei, attacked Bu, and became Chiqiu Hou with one thousand households.

cells.content: 八月丙辰封，二十年薨。
cells.literal: Eighth month Bing Chen day enfeoffed, twentieth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Bing Chen day of the eighth month; died in the twentieth year.

cells.content: 四十
cells.literal: Forty
cells.idiomatic: Forty

cells.content: 孝文九年，共侯朝嗣，十三年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen ninth year, Gong Marquis Chao succeeded, thirteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's ninth year, Gong Marquis Chao succeeded to the marquisate; died in the thirteenth year.

cells.content: 後六年，侯賢嗣，四十三年薨。
cells.literal: Hou sixth year, Marquis Xian succeeded, forty-third year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth year of Hou, Marquis Xian succeeded to the marquisate; died in the forty-third year.

cells.content: 元鼎二年，侯尊嗣，二年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Yuanding second year, Marquis Zun succeeded, second year, convicted of tribute wine deficiency, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In the second year of Yuanding, Marquis Zun succeeded to the marquisate; in the second year, he was convicted of tribute wine deficiency and dismissed.

cells.content: 元康四年，厲曾孫長安公士廣意詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Li's great-grandson Chang'an Gongshi Guangyi commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Li's great-grandson, Chang'an Gongshi Guangyi, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 臺定侯戴野
cells.literal: Tai Ding Hou Dai Ye
cells.idiomatic: Tai Ding Hou Dai Ye

cells.content: 以舍人從起碭，用隊率入漢，以都尉擊籍，籍死，擊臨江，屬將軍賈，功侯。以將軍擊燕、代。
cells.literal: As retainer followed uprising from Dang, used team commander entered Han, as commander attacked Yu, Yu died, attacked Linjiang, belonged to General Jia, merited marquis. As general attacked Yan, Dai.
cells.idiomatic: As a retainer, he followed the uprising from Dang. He used team commander to enter Han service, attacked Yu as commander, and after Yu died, attacked Linjiang. He belonged to General Jia and merited a marquisate. As a general, he attacked Yan and Dai.

cells.content: 八月甲子封，二十五年薨。
cells.literal: Eighth month Jia Zi day enfeoffed, twenty-fifth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Jia Zi day of the eighth month; died in the twenty-fifth year.

cells.content: 三十五
cells.literal: Thirty-five
cells.idiomatic: Thirty-five

cells.content: 孝文四年，侯午嗣，二十二年，孝景三年，坐謀反，誅。
cells.literal: Xiaowen fourth year, Marquis Wu succeeded, twenty-second year, Xiaojing third year, convicted of plotting rebellion, executed.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's fourth year, Marquis Wu succeeded to the marquisate; in the twenty-second year, during Emperor Jing's third year, he was convicted of plotting rebellion and executed.

cells.content: 孫
cells.literal: Grandson
cells.idiomatic: Grandson

cells.content: 曾孫
cells.literal: Great-grandson
cells.idiomatic: Great-grandson

cells.content: 元康四年，野玄孫長陵上造安昌詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Ye's great-great-grandson Changling Shangzao Anchang commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Ye's great-great-grandson, Changling Shangzao Anchang, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 安國武侯王陵
cells.literal: Anguo Wu Hou Wang Ling
cells.idiomatic: Anguo Wu Hou Wang Ling

cells.content: 以自聚黨定南陽，漢王還擊項籍，以兵屬，從定天下，侯，五千戶。
cells.literal: As self-gathered partisans pacified Nanyang, Han King returned attacked Xiang Yu, with troops belonged, followed pacified realm, made marquis, five thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As self-gathered partisans, he pacified Nanyang. When the Han King returned to attack Xiang Yu, he belonged with his troops and followed in pacifying the realm, for which he was made a marquis with five thousand households.

cells.content: 八月甲子封，二十一年薨。
cells.literal: Eighth month Jia Zi day enfeoffed, twenty-first year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Jia Zi day of the eighth month; died in the twenty-first year.

cells.content: 十二
cells.literal: Twelve
cells.idiomatic: Twelve

cells.content: 高后八年，哀侯忌嗣，一年薨。
cells.literal: Gao Hou eighth year, Ai Marquis Ji succeeded, first year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Empress Gao's eighth year, Ai Marquis Ji succeeded to the marquisate; died in the first year.

cells.content: 孝文元年，終侯斿嗣，三十九年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen first year, Zhong Marquis Zhan succeeded, thirty-ninth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's first year, Zhong Marquis Zhan succeeded to the marquisate; died in the thirty-ninth year.

cells.content: 建元元年，安侯辟方嗣，二十年薨。
cells.literal: Jianyuan first year, An Marquis Pi Fang succeeded, twentieth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the first year of Jianyuan, An Marquis Pi Fang succeeded to the marquisate; died in the twentieth year.

cells.content: 元狩三年，侯定嗣，八年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Yuanshou third year, Marquis Ding succeeded, eighth year, Yuanding fifth year, convicted of tribute wine deficiency, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In the third year of Yuanshou, Marquis Ding succeeded to the marquisate; in the eighth year, during the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of tribute wine deficiency and dismissed.

cells.content: 元康四年，陵玄孫長安公乘襄詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Ling's great-great-grandson Chang'an Gongcheng Xiang commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Ling's great-great-grandson, Chang'an Gongcheng Xiang, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 樂成節侯丁禮
cells.literal: Lecheng Jie Hou Ding Li
cells.idiomatic: Lecheng Jie Hou Ding Li

cells.content: 以中涓騎從起碭，為騎將入漢，定三秦，為正奉侯，以都尉擊籍，屬灌嬰，殺龍且，更為樂成侯，千戶。
cells.literal: As zhong jian rider followed uprising from Dang, became cavalry general entered Han, pacified Three Qin, became Zheng Feng Hou, as commander attacked Yu, belonged to Guan Ying, killed Long Qu, changed to Lecheng Hou, one thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As a zhong jian rider, he followed the uprising from Dang and became a cavalry general who entered Han service. He pacified the Three Qin territories and became Zheng Feng Hou. As a commander, he attacked Yu and belonged to Guan Ying. He killed Long Qu and was changed to Lecheng Hou with one thousand households.

cells.content: 八月甲子封，二十六年薨。
cells.literal: Eighth month Jia Zi day enfeoffed, twenty-sixth year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Jia Zi day of the eighth month; died in the twenty-sixth year.

cells.content: 四十二
cells.literal: Forty-two
cells.idiomatic: Forty-two

cells.content: 孝文五年，夷侯馬從嗣，十八年薨。
cells.literal: Xiaowen fifth year, Yi Marquis Ma Cong succeeded, eighteenth year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's fifth year, Yi Marquis Ma Cong succeeded to the marquisate; died in the eighteenth year.

cells.content: 後七年，式侯吾客嗣，四十二年薨。
cells.literal: Hou seventh year, Shi Marquis Wu Ke succeeded, forty-second year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the seventh year of Hou, Shi Marquis Wu Ke succeeded to the marquisate; died in the forty-second year.

cells.content: 元鼎二年，侯義嗣，三年，坐言五利侯不道，棄市。戶二千四百。
cells.literal: Yuanding second year, Marquis Yi succeeded, third year, convicted of speaking ill of Wuli Hou, executed in market. Households two thousand four hundred.
cells.idiomatic: In the second year of Yuanding, Marquis Yi succeeded to the marquisate; in the third year, he was convicted of speaking ill of the Wuli Hou and executed in the marketplace. His fief had two thousand four hundred households.

cells.content: 玄孫
cells.literal: Great-great-grandson
cells.idiomatic: Great-great-grandson

cells.content: 六世
cells.literal: Sixth generation
cells.idiomatic: Sixth generation

cells.content: 七世元康四年，禮玄孫之孫長安公士禹詔復家。
cells.literal: Seventh generation Yuankang fourth year, Li's great-great-grandson's grandson Chang'an Gongshi Yu commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the seventh generation, fourth year of Yuankang, Li's great-great-grandson's grandson, Chang'an Gongshi Yu, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 辟陽幽侯審食其
cells.literal: Piyang You Hou Shen Shiqi
cells.idiomatic: Piyang You Hou Shen Shiqi

cells.content: 以舍人初起，侍呂后、孝惠。二歲十月，呂后入楚，食其侍從一歲，侯。
cells.literal: As retainer initially rose, served Lü Hou, Xiaohui. Second year tenth month, Lü Hou entered Chu, Shiqi served followed one year, made marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a retainer who initially rose up, he served Empress Lü and Emperor Hui. In the tenth month of the second year, when Empress Lü entered Chu, Shen Shiqi served and followed for one year, for which he was made a marquis.

cells.content: 八月甲子封，二十五年，為淮南王長所殺。
cells.literal: Eighth month Jia Zi day enfeoffed, twenty-fifth year, killed by Huainan King Chang.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Jia Zi day of the eighth month; in the twenty-fifth year, he was killed by Huainan King Chang.

cells.content: 五十九
cells.literal: Fifty-nine
cells.idiomatic: Fifty-nine

cells.content: 孝文四年，侯平嗣，二十一年，孝��二年，坐謀反，自殺。
cells.literal: Xiaowen fourth year, Marquis Ping succeeded, twenty-first year, Xiaojing second year, convicted of plotting rebellion, committed suicide.
cells.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's fourth year, Marquis Ping succeeded to the marquisate; in the twenty-first year, during Emperor Jing's second year, he was convicted of plotting rebellion and committed suicide.

cells.content: 元康四年，食其曾孫茂陵公乘非詔復家。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Shiqi's great-grandson Maoling Gongcheng Fei commanded to restore the family.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Shiqi's great-grandson, Maoling Gongcheng Fei, was commanded to restore the family line.

cells.content: 糨成制侯周惞
cells.literal: Jiangcheng Zhi Hou Zhou Ma
cells.idiomatic: Jiangcheng Zhi Hou Zhou Ma

cells.content: 以舍人從起沛，至霸上，入漢，定三秦，食邑池陽，擊項籍滎陽，絕甬道，從度平陰，遇韓信軍襄國。楚、漢分鴻溝，以惞為信，戰不利，不敢離上，侯，二千二百戶。
cells.literal: As retainer followed uprising from Pei, to Baxiang, entered Han, pacified Three Qin, ate fief Chiyang, attacked Xiang Yu Xingyang, cut off passage, followed crossed Pingyin, encountered Han Xin army Xiangguo. Chu, Han divided Honggou, made Ma as messenger, battle unfavorable, dared not leave the emperor, made marquis, two thousand two hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As a retainer, he followed the uprising from Pei to Baxiang. He entered Han service and pacified the Three Qin territories. He received the fief of Chiyang and attacked Xiang Yu at Xingyang, cutting off the passage. He followed across Pingyin and encountered Han Xin's army at Xiangguo. When Chu and Han divided at Honggou, he was made Zhou Ma's messenger. The battle went unfavorably, but he dared not leave the emperor, for which he was made a marquis with two thousand two hundred households.

cells.content: 八月甲子封，二十七年薨。
cells.literal: Eighth month Jia Zi day enfeoffed, twenty-seventh year died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Jia Zi day of the eighth month; died in the twenty-seventh year.

cells.content: 二十二
cells.literal: Twenty-two
cells.idiomatic: Twenty-two

cells.content: 侯昌嗣，有罪，免。
cells.literal: Marquis Chang succeeded, guilty, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Chang succeeded to the marquisate; guilty and dismissed.

cells.content: 長沙
cells.literal: Changsha
cells.idiomatic: Changsha

cells.content: 鄲孝景中元年，康侯應以昌弟紹封，一年薨。
cells.literal: Dan Xiaojing middle first year, Kang Marquis Ying as Chang's younger brother continued enfeoffment, first year died.
cells.idiomatic: In Dan, Xiaojing's middle first year, Kang Marquis Ying, as Chang's younger brother, continued the enfeoffment; died in the first year.

cells.content: 中二年，侯仲居嗣，三十四年，元鼎三年，坐為太常收赤側錢不收，完為城旦。
cells.literal: Middle second year, Marquis Zhong Ju succeeded, thirty-fourth year, Yuanding third year, convicted of as taichang receiving red side money but not receiving, completed as walled laborer.
cells.idiomatic: In the middle second year, Marquis Zhong Ju succeeded to the marquisate; in the thirty-fourth year, during the third year of Yuanding, he was convicted of receiving red side money as taichang but not receiving it, and completed punishment as a walled laborer.

cells.content: 元康四年，惞曾孫長安公士禹詔賜黃金十斤復家，死，亡子，復免。
cells.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Ma's great-grandson Chang'an Gongshi Yu commanded granted ten catties gold to restore family, died, had no son, again dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Ma's great-grandson, Chang'an Gongshi Yu, was commanded to be granted ten catties of gold to restore the family line. He died and had no son, so it was dismissed again.

cells.content: 沛元始元年，惞玄孫護以詔書為次復禹同產弟子，死，亡子，絕。
安平敬侯鄂秋
以謁者漢王三年初從，定諸侯，有功秩，舉蕭何功，因故侯，二千戶。
八月甲子封，十二年薨。
六十一
孝惠三年，簡侯嘉嗣，九年薨。
高后八年，頃侯應嗣，十四年薨。
孝文十四年，煬侯寄嗣，二十五年薨。
孝景後三年，侯但嗣，十九年，元狩元年，坐與淮南王安通，遺王書稱臣盡力，棄市。
六世元康四年，秋玄孫之子解大夫后詔復家。
北平文侯張蒼
以客從起武陽，至霸上，為常山守，得陳餘，為代相，徙趙相，以代相侯，為計相四歲，淮南相十四歲。千二百戶。
八月丁丑封，五十年薨。
六十五
孝景六年，康侯奉嗣，八年薨。
後元年，侯類嗣，七年，建元五年，坐臨諸侯喪後，免。
曾孫
玄孫
六世元康四年，蒼玄孫之子長安公士蓋宗詔復家。
高胡侯陳夫乞
以卒從起杠里，入漢，以都尉擊籍，將軍定燕，千戶。
六年封，二十五年薨。
八十二
孝文五年，煬侯程嗣，薨，亡後。
元康四年，夫乞玄孫長陵公乘勝之詔復家。
厭次侯爰類
以慎將元年從起留，入漢，以都尉守廣武，功侯。
六年封，二十二年薨。
二十四
孝文元年，侯賀嗣，五年，謀反，誅。
孫
曾孫
玄孫
六世元康四年，類玄孫之子陽陵公士世詔復家。
七世元始三年，類玄孫之孫萬詔賜爵關內侯。
平皋煬侯劉它
漢六年以碭郡長初從，功比軑侯，侯，五百八十戶。實項氏，賜姓。
七年十月癸亥封，十年薨。
百二十一
孝惠五年，共侯遠嗣，三十四年薨。
孝景元年，節侯光嗣，十六年薨。
建元元年，侯勝嗣，二十八年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
玄孫
六世
七世元康四年，它玄孫之孫長安簪褭勝之詔復家。
復陽剛侯陳胥
以卒從起薛，以將軍入漢，以右司馬擊項籍，侯，千戶。
七年十月甲子封，三十一年薨。
四十九
孝文十一年，共侯嘉嗣，十八年薨。
孝景六年，康侯拾嗣，二十五年薨。
元朔元年，侯彊嗣，七年，元狩二年，坐父拾非嘉子，免。
元康四年，胥曾孫雲陽簪褭幸詔復家。
玄孫
六世元始元年，胥玄孫之子傳詔賜帛百疋。
陽河齊侯其石
以中謁者從入漢，以郎中騎從定諸侯，侯，五百戶，功比高湖侯。
十一月甲子封，三年薨。
八十三
十年，侯安國嗣，五十一年薨。
孝景中四年，侯午嗣，三十三年薨。
埤山元鼎四年，共侯章更封，十三年薨。
元封元年，侯仁嗣，征和三年，坐祝詛，要斬。
六世元康四年，石玄孫之子長安官大夫益壽詔復家。
柏至靖侯許盎
以駢鄰從起昌邑，以說衛入漢，以中尉擊籍，侯，千戶。
十月戊辰封，十四年，高后元年，有罪，免，三年，復封，六年薨。
五十八
孝文元年，簡侯祿嗣，十四年薨。
十五年，侯昌嗣，三十二年薨。
元光二年，侯安如嗣，十三年薨。
元狩三年，侯福嗣，五年，元鼎二年，坐為姦，為鬼薪。
六世元康四年，盎玄孫之子長安公士建詔復家。
中水嚴侯呂馬童
以郎騎將漢元年從好畤，以司馬擊龍且，復共斬項籍，侯，千五百戶。
正月己酉封，三十年薨。
百一
孝文十年，夷侯瑕嗣，三年薨。
十三年，共侯青眉嗣，三十二年薨。
建元六年，靖侯德嗣，一年薨。
元光元年，侯宜城嗣，二十二年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
六世
七世元康四年，馬童玄孫之孫長安公士建明詔復家。
杜衍嚴侯王翥
以中郎騎漢王二年從起下邳，屬淮陰侯，從灌嬰共斬項羽，侯，千七百戶。
正月己酉封，十八年薨。
百二
高后六年，共侯福嗣，七年薨。
孝文五年，孝侯市臣嗣，七年薨。
十二年，侯舍嗣，二十四年，有罪，為鬼薪。戶三千四百。
孝景後元年，侯郢人以翥子紹封，十二年薨。
元光四年，侯定國嗣，十三年，元狩五年，有罪，免。
元康四年，翥曾孫長安大夫安樂詔復家。
赤泉嚴侯楊喜
以郎中騎漢王二年從起杜，屬淮陰，後從灌嬰共斬項籍，侯，千九百戶。
正月己酉封，十三年，高后元年，有罪，免，二年，復封，十八年薨。
百三
孝文十二年，定侯敷嗣，十五年薨。
臨汝孝景四年，侯毋害嗣，六年，坐詐紿人臧六百，免。中五年，毋害復封，十二年，元光二年，有罪，免。
曾孫
元康四年，喜玄孫茂陵不更孟嘗詔賜黃金十斤，復家。
六世子恢代復。
七世子譚代。
八世子並代，永始元年，賜帛百疋。
元始二年，求復不得。
朝陽齊侯華寄
以舍人從起薛，以連敖入漢，以都尉擊項羽，復攻韓王信，侯，千戶。
三月壬寅封，十二年薨。
六十九
高后元年，文侯要嗣，二十一年薨。
孝文十四年，侯當嗣，三十九年，元朔二年，坐教人上書枉法，耏為鬼薪。戶五千。
曾孫
元康四年，寄玄孫奉明大夫定國詔復家。
棘陽嚴侯杜得臣
以卒從起湖陵，入漢，以郎將迎左丞相軍擊項籍，侯，二千戶。
七月丙申封，二十六年薨。
八十一
孝文六年，侯但嗣，四十三年薨。
元光四年，懷侯武嗣，七年，元朔五年薨，亡後。
涅陽嚴侯呂騰
以騎士漢三年從出關，以郎中共擊斬項羽，侯，千五百戶，比杜衍侯。
七年封，二十五年，孝文五年薨。子成實非子，不得代。
百四
孫
曾孫
玄孫
六世元康四年，騰玄孫之子镂陽不更忠詔復家。
平棘懿侯林摯
以客從起亢父，斬章邯所置蜀守，用燕相侯，千戶。
七年封，二十四年薨。
六十四
孝文五年，侯辟彊嗣，有罪，為鬼薪。
元康四年，摯曾孫項圉大夫常驩詔復家，死，亡子，絕。
深澤齊侯趙將夕
以趙將漢王三年降，屬淮陰侯，定趙、齊、楚，以擊平城功侯，七百戶。
八年十月癸丑封，十二年，高后元年，有罪，免，二年，復封，二年薨。
九十八
孝文後二年，戴侯頭嗣，八年薨。
孝景三年，侯脩嗣，七年，有罪，耏為司寇。
曾孫
元康四年，將夕玄孫平陵上造延世詔復家。
臾中五年，夷胡侯以頭子紹封，二十一年，元朔五年薨，亡後。
●頃侯溫疥
以燕將軍漢王四年從破曹咎軍，為燕相告燕王荼反，侯。以燕相國定盧綰。千九百戶。
十月丙辰封，二十五年薨。
九十一
孝文六年，文侯仁嗣，十七年薨。
後七年，侯何嗣，七年，孝景四年薨。
曾孫
元康四年，疥玄孫長安公士福詔復家。
歷簡侯程黑
以趙衛將軍漢王三年從起盧奴，擊項羽敖倉下，為將軍攻臧荼有功，封千戶。
十月癸酉封。十四年薨。
九十二
高后三年，孝侯氂嗣，二十二年薨。
孝文後元年，侯灶嗣，十四年，孝景中元年，有罪，免。
曾孫
玄孫
六世元康四年，黑玄孫之子長安簪褭弘詔復家。
元始五年。詔賜黑代復者安爵關內侯。
武原靖侯衛胠

中牟共侯單右車
以卒從沛，入漢，以郎擊布，功侯，二千二百戶。始高祖微時有急，給高祖馬，故得侯。
十二年十月乙未封，二十三年薨。
百二十五
孝文八年，敬侯繒嗣，五年薨。
十三年，戴侯終根嗣，三十七年薨。
元光二年，侯舜嗣，十八年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
玄孫
六世元康四年，右車玄孫之子陽陵不更充國詔復家。
踬嚴侯黃極忠
以群盜長為臨江將，已而為漢擊臨江王及諸侯，破布，封千戶。
十月戊戌封，二十七年薨。
百十三
孝文十二年，夷侯榮成嗣，九年薨。
後元五年，共侯明嗣，三十五年薨。
元朔五年，侯遂嗣，八年，元鼎元年，坐掩搏奪公主馬，髡為城旦。戶四千。
六世元康四年，極忠玄孫之子踬公乘調詔復家。
元始元年，賜極忠代後者敞爵關內侯。
博陽節侯周聚
以卒從豐，以隊率入漢，擊項籍成皋有功，為將軍，布反，定吳郡，侯。
十月辛丑封，二十四年薨。
五十三
孝文九年，侯鸱嗣，十五年，孝景元年，有罪，奪爵一級。
孫
元康四年，聚曾孫長陵公乘萬年詔復家。
陽羨定侯靈常
以荊令尹漢五年初從，擊鍾離辚及陳公利幾，徙為漢中大夫，從至陳，取韓信，遷中尉，以擊布，侯，二千戶。
十月壬寅封，十四年薨。
百一十九
高后七年，共侯賀嗣，八年薨。
孝文七年，哀侯勝嗣，六年薨，亡後。
曾孫
元康四年，常玄孫南和大夫橫詔復家。
下相嚴侯泠耳
以客從起沛，入漢，用兵擊破齊田解軍，以楚丞相堅守彭城距布軍，功侯，二千戶。
十月己酉封，十八年薨。
八十五
孝文三年，侯順嗣，二十三年，孝景三年，坐謀反，誅。
孫
曾孫
元康四年，耳玄孫長安公士安詔復家。
高陵圉侯王虞人
以騎司馬漢王元年從起廢丘，以都尉破田橫、龍且，追籍至東城，以將軍擊布，侯，九百戶。
十二月丁亥封，十年薨。
九十二
高后三年，侯弄弓嗣，十八年薨。
孝文十三年，侯行嗣，十二年，孝景三年，謀反，誅。
期思康侯賁赫
淮南王英布中大夫，告反，侯，一千戶。
十二月癸卯封，二十九年，孝文十四年薨，亡後。
百三十二
子
孫
曾孫
元康四年，赫玄孫壽春大夫充詔復家。
戚圉侯季必
以騎都尉漢二年初起櫟陽，攻破廢丘，因擊項籍，屬韓信，破齊，攻臧荼，為將軍，擊韓信，侯，千五百戶。
十二月癸卯封，十六年薨。
九十
孝文元年，賁侯長嗣，三年薨。
四年，躁侯瑕嗣，三十八年薨。
建元三年，侯信成嗣，二十年，元狩五年，坐為太常縱丞相侵神道，為隸臣。
元康四年，必玄孫長安公士買之詔復家。
穀陽定侯馮谿
以卒前二年起柘，擊籍，定代，為將軍，功侯。
正月乙丑封，二十二年薨。
百五
孝文七年，共侯熊嗣，十八年薨。
孝景二年，隱侯卯嗣，三年薨。
五年，懿侯解中嗣，十二年薨。
建元四年，侯偃嗣。
六世元康四年，谿玄孫之子穀陽不更武詔復家。
嚴敬侯許猜
以楚將漢二年降，從起臨濟，以郎中擊項羽、陳豨，侯，六百戶。
正月乙丑封，四十年薨。
百一十二
孝景二年，侯恢嗣，十六年薨。
建元二年，煬侯則嗣，九年薨。
元光五年，節侯周嗣，三年薨。
元朔二年，侯廣宗嗣，十五年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
六世元康四年，猜玄孫之子平壽公士任壽詔復家。
成陽定侯奚意
以魏郎漢王二年從起陽武，擊項籍，屬魏王豹，豹反，徙屬相國彭越，以太原尉定代，侯，六百戶。
正月乙酉封，二十六年薨。
百一十
孝文十一年，侯信嗣，二十九年，建元元年，有罪，要斬。
孫
元康四年，意曾孫陽陵公乘通詔復家。
桃安侯劉襄
以客從，漢王二年起定陶，以大謁者擊布，侯，千戶。為淮南太守。項氏親。
三月丁巳封，七年，孝惠七年，有罪，免，二年，復封，十六年薨。
百三十五
孝文十年，懿侯舍嗣，三十年��。
建元元年，厲侯由嗣，十三年薨。
元朔二年，侯自為嗣，十五年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
玄孫
六世元康四年，襄玄孫之子長安上造益壽詔復家。
高梁共侯酈疥
父食其以客從破秦，以列侯入漢，還定諸侯，常使使約和諸侯，說齊王死事，子侯。
二月丙寅封，六十三年薨。
六十六
元光三年，侯勃嗣。
侯平嗣，元狩元年，坐詐衡山王取金，免。
曾孫
元康四年，食其玄孫陽陵公乘賜詔復家。
紀信匡侯陳倉
以中涓從起豐，以騎將入漢，以將軍擊項籍，後攻廬綰，侯，七百戶。
六月壬辰封，十年薨。
八十
高后三年，夷侯開嗣，二十二年薨。
孝文後二年，侯煬嗣，八年，孝景二年，反，誅。
曾孫
玄孫
六世元康四年，倉玄孫之子長安公士千秋詔復家。
景嚴侯王競
以車司馬漢元年初從起高陵，屬劉賈，以都尉從軍，侯，五百戶。
六月壬辰封，七年薨。
百六
孝惠七年，戴侯真粘嗣，十九年薨。
孝文十一年，侯●嗣，二十二年，孝景十年，有罪，免。
曾孫
元康四年，競玄孫長安公士昌詔復家。
張節侯毛釋之
以中涓從起豐，以郎騎入漢，還從擊諸侯，侯，七百戶。
六月壬辰封，二十六年薨。
七十九
孝文十一年，侯鹿嗣，二年薨。
十三年，侯舜嗣，二十三年，孝景中六年，有罪，免。
曾孫
元康四年，釋之玄孫長安公士景詔復家。
煮棗端侯革朱
以越連敖從起薛，別以越將入漢，擊諸侯，以都尉侯，九百戶。
六月壬辰封，七年，孝惠七年薨。嗣子有罪，不得代。
七十五
孝文二年，康侯式以朱子紹封，二十一年薨。
孝景中二年，侯昌嗣，二年，有罪，免。
曾孫
元康四年，朱玄孫陽陵大夫奉詔復家。
傿陵嚴侯朱濞
以卒從起豐，入漢，以都尉擊項籍、臧荼，侯，二千七百戶。
十二月封，十一年薨。
五十二
高后四年，共侯慶嗣，十一年，孝文七年薨，亡後。
元康四年，濞曾孫陽陵公士言詔復家。
鹵嚴侯張平
以中尉前元年從起單父，不入關，以擊黥布、盧綰，得南陽，侯，二千七百戶。
十二月封，十二年薨。
四十八
高后五年，侯勝嗣，七年，孝文四年，有罪，為隸臣。
曾孫
玄孫
六世元康四年，平玄孫之子長安公士常詔復家。

sentences.zh: 右高祖百四十七人。
周呂、建成二人在外戚，羹頡、合陽、沛、德四人在王子，凡百五十三人。

cells.content: 便頃侯吳淺
以父長沙王功侯，二千戶。
元年九月癸卯封，三十七年薨。
百三十三
孝文後七年，共侯信嗣，六年薨。
孝景六年，侯廣志嗣。
侯千秋嗣，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
編元康四年，淺玄孫長陵上造長樂詔復家。
軑侯黎朱蒼
以長沙相侯，七百戶。
二年四月庚子封，八年薨。
百二十
高后三年，孝侯豨嗣，二十一年薨。
孝文十六年，彭祖嗣，二十四年薨。
侯扶嗣，元封元年，坐為東海太守行過擅發卒為衛，當斬，會赦，免。
玄孫江夏
平都孝侯劉到
以齊將高祖三年定齊降，侯，千戶。
五年六月乙亥封，十三年薨。
百一十
孝文三年，侯成嗣，三十五年，孝景後二年，有罪，免。
元康四年，到曾孫長安公乘如意詔復家。
南宮侯張買
以父越人為高祖騎將從軍，以中大夫侯。
元年四月丙寅封。
侯生嗣，孝武初有罪，為隸臣。萬六千六百戶。
北海
梧齊侯陽城延
以軍匠從起郟，入漢，後為少府，作長樂、未央宮，築長安城先就，侯。
四月乙酉封，六年薨。
七十六
七年，敬侯去疾嗣，三十四年薨。
孝景中三年，靖侯偃嗣，十五年薨。
元光三年，侯戎奴嗣，十四年，元狩五年，坐使人殺季父，棄市。戶三千三百。
玄孫
平定敬侯齊受
以卒從起留，以家車吏入漢，以驍騎都尉擊項籍，得樓煩將，用齊丞相侯。
四月乙酉封，九年薨。
五十四
孝文二年，齊侯市人嗣，四年薨。
六年，共侯應嗣，四十一年薨，亡後。
元光二年，康侯延居嗣，八年薨。
元鼎二年，侯昌嗣，二年，元鼎四年，有罪，免。
博成敬侯馮無擇
以悼武王郎中從高祖起豐，攻雍，共擊項籍，力戰，奉悼武王出滎陽，侯。
四月己丑封，三年薨。
四年，侯代嗣，八年，坐呂氏誅。
沅陵頃侯吳陽
以父長沙王功侯。
七月丙申封，二十五年薨。
百三十六
孝文後二年，頃侯福嗣，十七年薨。
孝景中五年，哀侯周嗣，薨，亡後。
中邑貞侯朱進
以執矛從入漢，以中尉破曹咎，用呂相侯，六百戶。
四年四月丙申封，二十二年薨。
孝文後二年，侯悼嗣，二十一年，孝景後三年，有罪，免。
樂平簡侯衛毋擇
以隊率從起沛，屬皇訢，以郎擊陳餘，用衛尉侯，六百戶。
四月丙申封，二年薨。
六年，共侯勝嗣，四十一年薨。
孝景後三年，侯侈嗣，六年，建元六年，坐買田宅不法，有請賕吏，死。
山都貞侯王恬啟
漢五年為郎中柱下令，以衛將軍擊陳豨，用梁相侯。
四月丙申封，八年薨。
孝文四年，憲侯中黃嗣，二十三年薨。
孝景四年，敬侯觸龍嗣，二十三年薨。
元狩五年，侯當嗣，八年，元封元年，坐闌入甘泉上林，免。
祝茲夷侯徐厲
以舍人從沛，以郎中入漢，還，得雍王邯家屬，用常山丞相侯。
四月丙申封，十一年薨。
孝文七年，康侯悼嗣，二十九年薨。
孝景中六年，侯偃嗣，九年，建元六年，有罪，免。
成陰夷侯周信
以卒從起單父，為呂后舍人，度呂后，為河南守，侯，五百戶。
四月丙申封，十六年薨。
孝文十二年，侯勃嗣，十五年，有罪，免。
俞侯呂它
父嬰以連敖從高祖破秦，入漢，以都尉定諸侯，功比朝陽侯，死事，子侯。
四月丙申封，四年，坐呂氏誅。
醴陵侯越
以卒從，漢二年起櫟陽，以卒吏擊項羽，為河內都尉，用長沙相侯，六百戶。
四月丙申封，八年，孝文四年，有罪，免。

sentences.zh: 高后十二人。
扶柳、襄城、軹、壺關、昌平、贅其、騰、昌城、腄、祝茲、建陵十一人在恩澤外戚，洨、沛、信都、樂昌、東平五人隨父，上邳、朱虛、東牟三人在王子，凡三十一人。

cells.content: 陽信夷侯劉揭
高祖十三年為郎，以典客奪呂祿印，閉殿門止產等，共立皇帝，侯，二千戶。
元年十一月辛丑封，十四年薨。
十五年，侯中意嗣，十四年，孝景六年，有罪，免。
壯武侯宋昌
以家吏從高祖起山東，以都尉從滎陽，食邑，以代中尉勸王，驂乘入即帝位，侯，千四百戶。
四月辛亥封，三十三年，孝景中四年，有罪，奪爵一級，為關內侯。
樊侯蔡兼
以睢陽令高祖初從阿，以韓家子還定北地，用常山相侯，千二百戶。
六月丙寅封，十四年薨。
十五年，康侯客嗣，十八年薨。
孝景中二年，共侯平嗣，二十一年薨。
元朔二年，侯辟方嗣，元鼎四年，坐搏揜，完為城旦。
沶陵康侯魏駟
以陽陵君侯。
七年三月丙寅封，十二年薨。亡後。
南●侯起
以信平君侯。
三月丙寅封，坐後父故削爵一級，為關內侯。
黎頃侯召奴
以父齊相侯。
十年四月癸丑封，十一年薨。
後五年，侯潰嗣，三十五年薨。
元朔五年，侯延嗣，十九年，元封六年，坐不出持馬，要斬。戶千八百。
缾侯孫單
父卬以北地都尉匈奴入力戰死事，子侯。
十四年三月丁巳封，十二年，孝景前三年，坐反，誅。
弓高壯侯韓隤當
以匈奴相國降，侯。故韓王子。
十六年六月丙子封。
不得子嗣侯者年名。
元朔五年，侯則嗣，薨，亡後。
襄城哀侯韓嬰
以匈奴相國降，侯，二千戶。韓王信太子之子。
六月丙子封，七年薨。
後七年，侯釋之嗣，三十一年，元朔四年，坐詐疾不從，耐為隸臣。
魏
故安節侯申屠嘉
孝文二年舉淮陽守，從高祖功，食邑五百戶，用丞相侯。
後三年四月丁巳封，七年薨。
孝景前三年，侯共嗣，二十二年薨。
清安元狩三年，侯臾更封，五年，元鼎元年，坐為九江太守受故官送，免。

sentences.zh: 右孝文十人。
軹、鄔、周陽三人在外戚，管、氏營丘、營平、陽虛、楊丘、朸、安都、平昌、武成、白石、阜陵、安陽、陽周、東城十四人在王子，凡二十七人。
